Class EncodeAndDecode

java.lang.Object
  project.EncodeAndDecode

public class EncodeAndDecode
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Stephen Herbein, Ronald Lewis, Kyle Tucker Encodes text messages and images into an image and decodes them.

Method Detail

encodeText

public static void encodeText(java.io.File original,
                              java.io.File writeTo,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              AES anAES)
Encodes a text message in an image. Writes encoded image to a png file.

Parameters:
original - File containing the image where the text will be hidden.
writeTo - File where the new image should be written to.
message - Text to be hidden in the image.
anAES - Object used for Encryption.

encodePicture

public static void encodePicture(java.io.File hideThis,
                                 java.io.File hideIn,
                                 java.lang.String writeTo,
                                 AES anAES)
Encodes an image in another image. Writes encoded image to a png file.

Parameters:
hideThis - File containing image to be hidden.
hideIn - File containing image that will contain other image.
writeTo - File where the new image should be written to.
anAES - Object used for Encryption.

                          java.io.File writeTo,
                          java.lang.String password)
Gets the hidden message or image from the given image.

Parameters:
encoded - File containing the encoded image.
writeTo - Location the new File should be written to.
password - Key required for decryption.

checkText

public static boolean checkText(java.awt.image.BufferedImage encodedImage)
Returns a boolean representing if a message is encoded in the image.

Parameters:
encodedImage - Image to be checked for a hidden message.
Returns:
Whether or not the given image contains a message.

decodeText

public static void decodeText(java.awt.image.BufferedImage encodedImage,
                              java.io.File writeTo,
                              AES anAES)
Gets the hidden message from an image. Writes message to a text file.

Parameters:
encodedImage - Image containing the hidden message.
writeTo - Location to write the new file.
anAES - Object used for Decryption.

decodeImage

                               java.io.File writeTo,
                               AES anAES)
Gets the image hidden in the given encoded image. Writes hidden image to a png file.

Parameters:
encodedImage - Image with another image hidden within it.
writeTo - Location to write the hidden image to.
anAES - Object used for Decryption.
